title: Constant Ping spikes and DC's (Dodo internet)
body:
Has anyone found a solution to the pathetic excusse for an ISP that is Dodo?

We have 3 gamers living in one house, and our Landlady decided to swap from bigpond to dodo to save money, Now we all get from 32 - 9000 ping every game, spending more time over 400 ping than under it.

Any ideas?

Shes hell bent on keeping this junk.

replies.body:
Dodos are extinct, just like your hopes of good ping with Dodo.
Apparently a lot of people have problems with Dodo, like a greater percentage than people have problems with other providers.
Anyway, your landlady is the one who wants to save money. You have three gamers living in this house. I would suggest you swap back and the only solution may be to negotiate with her about it. Talk to your fellow gamers about it first, I think. Would you all be willing to put in, collectively, enough money so that the landlady is still saving her money?

get a new place to rent.. if you do your homework you can find one near an exchange. I used to be 150m from an exchange in Adelaide and i had 160 latency to na.

At my old house before that it was 220.
I'm on dodo. My ping never goes over 40.
